page.title: 13Employment
page.content: Employment of the residents of the area is varied, and reflects the national trends. The majority of workers have to travel{outside the {area,}and the local{power stations provide the main source of employment, particularly at High Marnham, just north of Normanton. The{farming industry}within the area provides work for local people, but tends to employ just the families who own the farms, with{casual labour}at busy times. Other residents of the area find their employment in a{haulage depot,}a {coalyard,}a{smithy,}a{market garden which specialises in horticulture and a{building firm.}The{motor repair trade,{horse stabling,}the{publican trade and{teaching}are also represented.
